result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Chelsea Victoria Hill

records.addlTxt:
2:30 PM Chelsea Victoria Hill appears in Court, Atty Derek W Sanders, DA Halle E. Hatch for the State of Wisconsin. DA Hatch states this is resolved or close and asking for a plea in 45-60 days. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 2:36 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 22, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on December 22, 2022 at 10:00 am.

9:07 AM  District Attorney Halle E. Hatch in Court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Derek W Sanders in court with Chelsea Victoria Hill.  DA Hatch requests case rescheduled for 60 days out as they are waiting on blood results.  Atty. Sanders agrees.
Status conference scheduled for September 27, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Status conference on September 27, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
of M.L.D. & M.R.D. filed by sb w/VW. eif
filed by DA Halle Hatch. eif

ADDRESS INFO for Chelsea Victoria Hill
Current: 10797 Cedar Heights Tr, Hastings, MN 55033 United States  (Effective: 06-16-2022)
Prior: N6091 Cty Tk QQ, Prescott, WI 54021
Status conference on July 28, 2022 at 09:00 am.

12:11 PM  Defendant Chelsea Victoria Hill in Court with Attorney Derek W Sanders via Zoom videoconferencing.  DA Halle E. Hatch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court confirms receipt of Information.  Advises of charges and possible penalties.  Further reading waived.  Atty. Sanders enters NG pleas.  Bond continues.  Court confirms Defendant's address and phone.  Adjourned at 12:15 PM

11:59 AM Defendant Chelsea Victoria Hill in Court with Attorney Derek W Sanders via Zoom videoconferencing.  DA Halle E. Hatch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  S/T RF Deputy Alex Sather.  Direct by DA Hatch.  12:04 PM.  Defendant identified.  Atty. Sanders declines questioning at this time.  Witness excused.  Atty. Sanders declines witnessess and argument.  DA Hatch requests Court find probable cause and bind Defendant over, states argument.  Court makes findings; finds probable cause that a felony was committed, probably committed by Defendant and binds Defendant over for trial.  Status conference scheduled for July 28, 2022 at 09:00 am.
filed by Atty Sanders

records.descr: Order on motion to seal/redact court record

records.addlTxt: Preliminary hearing on June 15, 2022 at 12:00 pm.

Defendant to maintain Absolute Sobriety.
Not to enter any bars, taverns or liquor stores where alcohol is the primary sales/service.
Not to possess or consume any alcohol.
Contact with her 2 children only as approved by C.P.S.
Def from PCJ

3:14 PM Defendant Chelsea Victoria Hill appears in custody from Jail via video, Atty Derek W Sanders appears by phone, DA Halle Hatch appears for the State of Wisconsin.  Court informs Defendant of charges, and possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Waives reading. Court reviews DE's rights. DA Hatch is requesting a $500.00 CB w/conditions of AS, NTE & contact w/her 2 daughters as approved by C.P.S., objection. Court orders a $10,000.00 SIBS w/conditions as requested. Prelim demanded. Atty Sanders may appear by zoom for the PH. DE does qualify for PD. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 3:33 pm.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 15, 2022 at 12:00 pm.
